subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Roberto Luongo stopped 20 shots and made Chris Higgins’s second-period goal stand up in the host Vancouver Canucks’ 1-0 win over the Nashville Predators in the opener of the Western Conference semifinals.
snippet: Roberto Luongo stopped 20 shots and made Chris Higgins’s second-period goal stand up in the host Vancouver Canucks’ 1-0 win over the Nashville Predators in the opener of the Western Conference semifinals.
